properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 21 at 2:53PM PST until January 22 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Small craft conditions expected tonight, southwest winds
15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 16 to 18 feet at 14
seconds. Gale conditions expected, south winds 20 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and seas 13 to 15 feet at 13 seconds
expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from
10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 AM to 4 PM PST Wednesday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The gales will be south of the Columbia
River Bar.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY
